summary: Two misfits form an unlikely relationship after a woman breaks into a man's house only to discover him in the midst of a suicide attempt.
cast: Hye-jeong Kang|Hee-soon Park|Seung-Hyun Lee|Byeong-gyun Ahn|Gwi-hwa Choi|Dong-hyeon Geum|Eun-ji Jo|Kkobbi Kim|Mo-ah Kim|Oh Kwang-rok|Tae-yeong Lee|Jae-won Moon|Jung-hee Moon|Hye-yeon Ryu|Young-hwa Seo
title: Woo-ri-jib-e wae-wass-ni
